DECLARATION OF JARED ISAACMAN IN SUPPORT OF
SHIFT4’S MOTION FOR PARTIAL SUMMARY JUDGMENT OF
NO WILLFUL INFRINGEMENT

I, Jared Isaacman, declare as follows:
1.

My name is Jared Isaacman. I am over 18 years of age, and I am competent to

make this Declaration. The facts stated in this Declaration are true and correct and based on my
own personal knowledge.
2.

I am the Chief Executive Officer of Shift4 Payments, LLC and Shift4 Payments,

LLC (collectively, “Shift4”). In this role, I oversee all of Shift4’s operations.
3.

On November 26, 2019, counsel for Card Connect notified Shift4 for the first time

of alleged infringement of the patents-in-suit on an investor call related to an unrelated matter. Before
this date, Shift4 was unaware of any allegations that its products or services infringed the patents-in-
suit, United States Patent Nos. 8,930,289 (the “‘289 Patent”), 9,407,654 (the “‘654 Patent”), and
10,135,811 (the “‘811 Patent”) (collectively, the “Patents-in-Suit”). Indeed, before November 26,
2019, upon information and belief, Shift4 was unaware of the Patents-in-Suit.

Case 1:19-cv-01334-UNA Document 262 Filed 03/07/22 Page 2 of 9 PageID #: 10882

4.

After receiving notice of the Patents-in-Suit on November 26, 2019, I instructed

Shift4’s counsel to gather documents related to the Patents-in-Suit. I instructed some of Shift4’s
technical employees to attempt to locate documents relating to the Patents-in-Suit to obtain information
relating to the patents’ claims, timing, and background of the inventions.
5.

I also attended a meeting with Shift4’s counsel to discuss the Patents-in-Suit. I

attended that meeting to discuss any potential risk the Patents-in-Suit could present to Shift4.
6.

I have also periodically conferred with counsel regarding counsel’s assessment of

potential risks, ongoing analysis, and evolution of thought regarding the Patents-in-Suit.
I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America that the

foregoing is true and correct.
Executed on

, 2022.
